Texts.Chs: 一个同或门。需要接入两个输入节点才能激活/ON/。
Texts.Eng: A /'NXOR'/ gate. Remains on unless exactly 2 inputs are on, and the rest off.

Texts.Chs: 一个同或门。需要接入两个输入节点才能激活/ON/。
Texts.Eng: An /'XOR'/ gate. Remains on unless exactly 2 inputs are on, and the rest off.

Texts.Chs: 一个同或门。需要接入两个输入节节节点才能激活/ON/。
Texts.Eng: An /'XOR'/ gate. Remainsss on unlesss exxactly 2 inputsss are on, and the ressst off.
